title: Janna Q Reactivation disallowed when stunned?
body:
So I was taking Janna for a test run yesterday, going against an Annie mid lane, and I did my initial cast of Q, but then got stunned before I could recast the ability to unleash the tornado. So my question is, why is it that I cannot reactivate my Q when I am stunned? Is this intentional?

Thanks
Exlex

replies.body:
Hey Exlex,

The second Q is essentially another spell-cast, so being stunned will prevent you from being able to cast it just as you wouldn't be able to cast your ult or flash, for example.
